The Staffing/ Bench processes may slightly differ depending on the practice/ organization you work in. Please, make sure you’re closely working with your dedicated Staffing Supply specialist / Bench Manager and People Partner so that you know and follow the process correctly*\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aa51fcc0-f091-4eb2-a377-b823e6683754/Staffing%20&%20Bench.png?preview=true\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":530,\"height\":298},\"align\":\"align-center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The core of our organization is our ability to deliver on the promises we make and the expectations we create. We want to be efficient in minimizing waste and maximizing gain and performance. It is central to people utilization management to ensure people are getting assigned to projects appropriately.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a manager who manages people in delivery, you are expected to perform a set of actions and make decisions regarding Staffing activities. Staffing is a continuous process that takes place when an employee is:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"rotated from their current project to another one\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"going on Bench for this or that reason\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" In either of those scenarios, managers' responsibilities will mostly be the same. But before we get directly to them, let’s talk about Rotations and Bench.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Rotations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee rotation is a planned or sudden movement of an employee from one assignment to another (without unstaffed time/going to the bench). This may be done either to meet the business needs (rotation initiated by the account/ project) and/ or to respond to the employee’s interest (initiated by the employee’s request). Once you’ve found out about such a need, you are responsible for initiating the rotation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Discuss a rotation plan with the employee and their Delivery/Account Please note that you will closely cooperate with a Bench Manager and Supply Coordinator, your dedicated People Partner, employee him/herself, and any other people in Business and/ or Delivery organizations that may help you find a position for your report.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Whenever your report gets on the bench or is considered for Rotation, you, as their Resource Manager, are  to:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Monitor the employee’s billable workload\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For resources that are being rolled off the project soon, confirm their availability with respective project owners (DM/AM). Engage with such resources immediately to discuss further steps. It is always best to reach out to the employee as soon as availability is confirmed, even if that is weeks away, so as to maximize the time available to prepare and search.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once This might be the case where a  performance improvement plan (PIP) may be required.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Communicate with the employee on a regular basis\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Conduct a call with an employee to discuss feedback received, Bench guidelines and expectations as well the plan of actions.
